attributes.action: Demand resignation of Labour MP David Lammy for anti-democratic views
attributes.additional_details:
David Lammy has called on Parliament to defy the result of Britain's EU referendum.

The Labour MP for Tottenham called on fellow politicians to "stop this madness".

He said in a statement: "Wake up. We do not have to do this. We can stop this madness and bring this nightmare to an end through a vote in Parliament. Our sovereign Parliament needs to now vote on whether we should exit the EU.

"The referendum was an advisory, non-binding referendum.
attributes.background: David Lammy wants to ignore the view of the majority of the UK and therefore change the UK from a democratic society. Please read his statement in media

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
